PrivacyPolicy.Title: PRIVACY POLICY OF THE WEBSITE
PrivacyPolicy.Purposes of Processing: Facilitate, streamline and fulfill the commitments established between the Website and the User
PrivacyPolicy.Data Security: Necessary technical and organizational measures are adopted
User Rights: Not to be subject to a decision based solely on automated processing
PrivacyPolicy.Links to Third Parties: The owners of those websites will have their own data protection policies

Acceptance and Changes in the Privacy Po.Text: Using the Website will imply acceptance of its Privacy Policy. The right to modify the Privacy Policy is reserved.
